<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
<head>
  <title>Testimonial Slider</title>
  <style>
    * {
      box-sizing: border-box;
    }
   
    .testimonial-slider {
      position: relative;
      width: 500px;
      height: 300px;
      margin: 0 auto;
      overflow: hidden;
    }
   
    .testimonial-slider .slides {
      display: flex;
      width: 100%;
      height: 100%;
      transition: transform 0.5s ease;
    }
   
    .testimonial-slider .slide {
      flex: 0 0 100%;
      padding: 20px;
      text-align: center;
    }
   
    .testimonial-slider .slide img {
      width: 100px;
      height: 100px;
      border-radius: 50%;
      margin-bottom: 10px;
    }
   
    .testimonial-slider .slide h3 {
      font-size: 20px;
      margin-bottom: 10px;
    }
   
    .testimonial-slider .slide p {
      font-size: 16px;
    }
   
    .testimonial-slider .controls {
      position: absolute;
      bottom: 10px;
      left: 50%;
      transform: translateX(-50%);
    }
   
    .testimonial-slider .controls button {
      background-color: #333;
      color: #fff;
      border: none;
      padding: 5px 10px;
      margin: 0 5px;
      cursor: pointer;
    }
   
    .testimonial-slider .controls button:focus {
      outline: none;
    }
  </style>
</head>
<body>
  <div class="testimonial-slider">
    <div class="slides">
      <div class="slide">
        <img src="image1.jpg" alt="Testimonial Image">
        <h3>John Doe</h3>
        <p>Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit.</p>
      </div>
      <div class="slide">
        <img src="image2.jpg" alt="Testimonial Image">
        <h3>Jane Smith</h3>
        <p>Ut enim ad minim veniam, quis nostrud exercitation ullamco laboris nisi ut aliquip ex ea commodo consequat.</p>
      </div>
      <div class="slide">
        <img src="image3.jpg" alt="Testimonial Image">
        <h3>Mark Johnson</h3>
        <p>Duis aute irure dolor in reprehenderit in voluptate velit esse cillum dolore eu fugiat nulla pariatur.</p>
      </div>
    </div>
    <div class="controls">
      <button class="prev">Prev</button>
      <button class="next">Next</button>
    </div>
  </div>

  <script>
    let slider = document.querySelector('.testimonial-slider');
    let slides = document.querySelector('.slides');
    let slideWidth = slider.clientWidth;
    let currentSlide = 0;
   
    function slideTo(index) {
      slides.style.transform = `translateX(-${slideWidth * index}px)`;
    }
   
    function nextSlide() {
      currentSlide = (currentSlide + 1) % slides.childElementCount;
      slideTo(currentSlide);
    }
   
    function prevSlide() {
      currentSlide = (currentSlide - 1 + slides.childElementCount) % slides.childElementCount;
      slideTo(currentSlide);
    }
   
    document.querySelector('.next').addEventListener('click', nextSlide);
    document.querySelector('.prev').addEventListener('click', prevSlide);
  </script>
</body>
</html>
